overview: Three hunks, 1 car, 1 road trip, what could go wrong? When muscle man Scott Hunter gets lost, American superstar Tom Wolfe sticks by him and pitches up whilst Greek god Rio Silver heads off to get some help. After a chance encounter with country gents Geoff and Joe beckoning Rio in to a sex-fueled world, his two city buddies make their way there with a little help, once at the cottage, there could be no escape.
title: The Weekend
